row.value: Configuración de Grid a Nivel de Sistema

value.original: Define the Grid Configuration at System Level

row.value: Define la Configuración de Grid a Nivel de Sistema

value.original: In this tab the user can set some properties that will be used to define how the grid filtering should work at system level. The values set here will be used in all grids, unless its properties are overriden at tab or field level.

row.value: In this tab the user can set some properties that will be used to define how the grid filtering should work at system level. The values set here will be used in all grids, unless its properties are overriden at tab or field level.
Componente de Barra de Navegación
Componente de Barra de Navegación
Pestaña
Configuración del Grid a nivel de Pestána

value.original: In this tab the user can set some properties that will be used to define how the grid filtering should work in the selected tab. The values set here will be used in all its fields, unless its properties are overriden at field level. If a property is not set, its value will be taking from the system level.

row.value: In this tab the user can set some properties that will be used to define how the grid filtering should work in the selected tab. The values set here will be used in all its fields, unless its properties are overriden at field level. If a property is not set, its value will be taking from the system level.
Definición de proceso
Acceso para definición de proceso

value.original: Grants access to Process Definition. By default, access to process definitions in a window (invoked from a button), is inherited from the permission to the window. To revoke this inherited access and manually decide case by case which are the accessible processes, it is necessary to define a "Secured Process" Preference (at system level or for that specific window) with "Y" as value.

row.value: Grants access to Process Definition. By default, access to process definitions in a window (invoked from a button), is inherited from the permission to the window. To revoke this inherited access and manually decide case by case which are the accessible processes, it is necessary to define a "Secured Process" Preference (at system level or for that specific window) with "Y" as value.

value.original: Maintain access by role to navigation bar components

row.value: Mantenimiento de los permisos de acceso de roles a los componentes de barra de navegación

Mostrar Permisos de Rol

value.original: Defines the access to views by Role.

row.value: Define los permisos de acceso de los roles a las vistas.

value.original: Defines the access to views by Role.

row.value: Defines the access to views by Role.
Campo
Configuración de Grid a Nivel de Campo

value.original: In this tab the user can set some properties that will be used to define how the grid filtering should work in the selected field. If a property is not set, its value will be taking from the tab level. If it is not defined in the tab level, its value will be taken from the system level.

row.value: In this tab the user can set some properties that will be used to define how the grid filtering should work in the selected field. If a property is not set, its value will be taking from the tab level. If it is not defined in the tab level, its value will be taken from the system level.
Parámetros de Menú
Parámetros de Menú

value.original: The menu parameters are used in the new user interface to pass parameters to standard view implementations.

row.value: The menu parameters are used in the new user interface to pass parameters to standard view implementations.
Implementación de Vista

value.original: A view is shown in the main user interface, the view implementation defines the javaclass responsible for generating the client-side javascript.

row.value: Una vista se muestra en el interfaz de usuario principal. La implementación de vista define la clas Java responsable de generar el Javascript del lado del cliente.

value.original:
A view is shown in the user interface as a tab in the multi-tab interface or as a popup. The view can be anything from a grid, form or a popup window. When the view is shown in the multi-tab interface then it must be a Smartclient canvas.
The view implementation defines the component which is capable of generating the client side javascript to be shown in the browser. A view implementation is a java class which extends the org.openbravo.client.kernel.BaseTemplateComponent class.

row.value:
A view is shown in the user interface as a tab in the multi-tab interface or as a popup. The view can be anything from a grid, form or a popup window. When the view is shown in the multi-tab interface then it must be a Smartclient canvas.
The view implementation defines the component which is capable of generating the client side javascript to be shown in the browser. A view implementation is a java class which extends the org.openbravo.client.kernel.BaseTemplateComponent class.
Implementación de Vista

value.original: Edit the selected role's access to specified application view impementations.

row.value: Editar el acceso del rol selecionado a las implementaciones de vistas de la aplicación especificadas.

value.original: View implementation tab allows to select customized views.

row.value: View implementation tab allows to select customized views.
Personalización de Ventana
Mantiene la personalización de la ventana

value.original: Window Personalization list and maintains the customized form views.

row.value: Window Personalization list and maintains the customized form views.
